The numbers "15" and "90" that precede "HTN" could represent different categories or stages of hypertension, although the exact meaning of these numbers is not clear from the given paragraph.

Regardless, the two entities "15 / HTN" and "90 / HTN" are the only ones in the paragraph that can be identified as diseases, and they are presented in the table as they appear in the original text.
